articles.title: RRR Fame SS Rajamouli Set to Direct Hollywood Film? He Says 'Back in India, I'm the Dictator...' - News18
articles.description: At the RRR screening with Directors Guild of America recently, SS Rajamouli had said that his magnum opus is 'not a Bollywood film'.
articles.content: After the massive critical and commercial success of RRR across the globe, filmmaker SS Rajamouli has opened up about his plans to direct a Hollywood film. Most recently, RRR won the Critics Choice a… [+1444 chars]
